snippet: A new study shows that the top leadership positions among Football Bowl Subdivision universities and conferences remain overwhelmingly white and male, with whites holding 336 (88 percent) of the 381 campus leadership positions.
abstract: Report by Institute for Diversity and Ethics in Sport shows that top leadership positions among Football Bowl Subdivision universities and conferences remain overwhelmingly white and male.
lead_paragraph: A new study shows that the top leadership positions among Football Bowl Subdivision universities and conferences remain overwhelmingly white and male, with whites holding 336 (88 percent) of the 381 campus leadership positions.

headline.main: Key Leadership at F.B.S. Schools Is White and Male, Study Shows

keywords.value: Institute for Diversity and Ethics in Sport
keywords.name: organizations
